headline.print_headline: EU Scheme Commits $350 Million for Research on Ebola Vaccines, Tests
headline.main: EU Scheme Commits $350 Million for Research on Ebola Vaccines, Tests

docs.lead_paragraph: The Europe Union and drugmakers pledged on Thursday to invest 280 million euros ($350 million) in Ebola research, with the lion's share going to the testing and manufacture of potential vaccines.
docs.snippet: The Europe Union and drugmakers pledged on Thursday to invest 280 million euros ($350 million) in Ebola research, with the lion's share going to the testing and manufacture of potential vaccines.

headline.print_headline: Election Day Entailed Casting Votes for Soda Taxes and Food Issues Too
headline.main: Election Day Entailed Casting Votes for Soda Taxes and Food Issues Too

docs.abstract: Voters across the country delivered mixed messages on number of measures and initiatives involving food and beverages; food and biotech companies spent at least $60 million fighting proposals linked to what Americans eat and drink, and considerable amount of media attention was devoted to food issues in midterm elections.
docs.lead_paragraph: Food and biotech companies spent $60 million battling proposals dealing with what Americans can and cannot eat and drink.
docs.snippet: Food and biotech companies spent $60 million battling proposals dealing with what Americans can and cannot eat and drink.

headline.print_headline: Ballot Measures: Oregon, DC Voters OK Use of Pot
headline.main: Ballot Measures: Oregon, DC Voters OK Use of Pot

docs.lead_paragraph: Voters in Oregon and the District of Columbia legalized the use of recreational pot, elating marijuana activists who hope to extend their winning streak across the country.
docs.snippet: Voters in Oregon and the District of Columbia legalized the use of recreational pot, elating marijuana activists who hope to extend their winning streak across the country.

headline.print_headline: Soda Makers Headed for Tax Showdown in California
headline.main: Soda Makers Headed for Tax Showdown in California

docs.lead_paragraph: No American city has passed a ballot measure raising taxes on sugary drinks, and ahead of votes Tuesday in Berkeley and San Francisco, the U.S. soda industry has been working hard to keep it that way.
docs.snippet: No American city has passed a ballot measure raising taxes on sugary drinks, and ahead of votes Tuesday in Berkeley and San Francisco, the U.S. soda industry has been working hard to keep it that way.

docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by science writer Ed Yong warns that quest for healthy microbiome may be misguided; notes that research about manipulating a body's microbiome is still in its infancy; contends microbiome is complex, varied, ever changing and context-dependent, qualities that defy easy categorization.
docs.lead_paragraph: The same microbes can be helpful allies or dangerous threats.
docs.snippet: The same microbes can be helpful allies or dangerous threats.
